segments.text: I'm trying to take in the whole scene at once.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an ordinary kitchen, but so much is going wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm garden visible through the window makes it even stranger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, everything looks tidy and serene, a perfect contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, water is flowing everywhere from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That faucet has been running for a while, I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, utterly oblivious to the mess at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there are the kids, balancing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're reaching for cookies, completely absorbed in their own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly a snapshot of domestic chaos, undetected by the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing water is really starting to bother me now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the slippery floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to turn off that tap.
segments.speaker: PAR
